item.description:
On Saturday Oct. 13th 2012 at approximately 9:30 PM EST....

Select Individuals, Tastemakers & Urban Socialites from across Connecticut, Western Mass, Rhode Island, & New York will convene Downtown New Haven, CT to rebel against traditional "Nightlife" standards. The highly requested "Non-Party" Urban Professional Experience in Connecticut Returns. A place for TRUE Professionals looking for the alternative to the traditional "Party" or "Nightlife" options. A place to dine, unwind, or dance with Eclectic trendsetters seeking an escape from the norm.

Mr.3000's Soul Lounge - Sat. 10.13

Celebrating Jason V. Watts 31st Birthday!
The Annual Young Professional Libra Extravanganza

hosted by:

Jason V. Watts - New Haven, CT
Resuscitate Fashion Media - Hartford, CT
Fashion Designer, Carmen Veal - Hartford, CT
Music Producer, Xavier Kemp - Bridgeport, CT
Artist, Andre Rochester - Middletown, CT
The Social Virtuoso - New York, NY

Music provided by Mr.3000 (Atlanta) & DJ Astro (New York,NY)
HOUSE - NEO-SOUL -DANCE - OLD SCHOOL - WORLD MUSIC

1st 50 To RSVP Online receive FREE Admission | CLICK HERE

This event will cater to the New England Professional looking to relax in a safe environment, while taking advantage of unmatched ambiance, music, & dining options.

This event is Unique, Trendy, & Selective in Nature. This intimate setting will ONLY hold 150 people. The 1st 50 people to register online will receive FREE entry before 11pm. It is suggested that you act very quickly & advise friends, co-workers, family to do the same. Vendor Tables available starting at $75 * call 203.444.2509

FOR TICKETS SALES VISIT
http://www.3000soul.com

Or call/text Jason V. Watts
203.444.2509 for Info, Birthdays, or VIP Tables.
item.name: Mr.3000's Soul Lounge returns with Jason V. Watts Annual Libra Birthday Bash!
